subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description:
Output 1: Government of Croatia equipped and capable to mainstream CSR policies into existing and future legal framework

Output 2: 
Preconditions for sucessful partnership projects are met with key private sector actors and local and national government counterparts are able to indentify and design potential partnership initiatives.

Output 3: Companies and government educated on best CSR policies and practices in order to be able to devise, monitor, implement & promote CSR practices and partnerships
subproject.title: BUSINESS PARTNERSHIPS
